title.rendered: Piklist is not just for Post Types, Taxonomies and Custom Fields

content.rendered:
Piklist has often been compared to some of the more popular plugins available to create Post Types, Taxonomies and Custom Fields. Though Piklist does a great job of this, it also does a whole lot more. Piklist is designed to make EVERYTHING in WordPress easier and better. Here’s a short list of the things you can build better with Piklist:

  • Widgets
  • Help Tabs
  • Pointers
  • Admin Notices
  • Dashboard Widgets
  • Workflow Tabs

There’s a whole lot more that Piklist can do as well, but this list should get you started.
